snippet: A group of French farmers has gone on an egg-breaking rampage on roads and pledging to smash many more in protest against low prices.
abstract: Group of French poultry farmers has gone on an egg-breaking rampage, destroying tens of thousands of eggs on roads and pledging to smash many more in protest against low prices.
lead_paragraph: A group of French farmers has gone on an egg-breaking rampage on roads and pledging to smash many more in protest against low prices.

headline.main: France: Farmers Smash Eggs in Protest
headline.print_headline: France: Farmers Smash Eggs in Protest
